doc:
Tom Gallery https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Gallery 0 Tom Gallery (November 27, 1897 – August 25, 1993) was an American film actor. He appeared in 21 films between 1920 and 1927 and was married to actress ZaSu Pitts. Subsequently, he became a successful sports promoter. Tom_Gallery ( November_27_,_1897 – August_25_,_1993 ) was an_American_film_actor . He appeared in 21_films between 1920_and_1927 and was_married to actress_ZaSu_Pitts . Subsequently , he became a_successful_sports_promoter .
